```{r include = FALSE}
# load ids
ids <- strsplit(params$ids, "-")[[1]] # split by "-" SO ID must NOT CONTAIN "-"

# make a list from the ids 
if (length(ids) == 2) {dh_organoid_ids <- list(ids[[1]], ids[[2]])

} else if (length(ids) == 3) {dh_organoid_ids <- list(ids[[1]], ids[[2]], ids[[3]]) 

} else if (length(ids) == 4) {dh_organoid_ids <- list(ids[[1]], ids[[2]], ids[[3]], ids[[4]])

} else if (length(ids) == 5) {dh_organoid_ids <- list(ids[[1]], ids[[2]], ids[[3]], ids[[4]], ids[[5]])

} else if (length(ids) == 6) {dh_organoid_ids <- list(ids[[1]], ids[[2]], ids[[3]], ids[[4]], ids[[5]], ids[[6]])}
```
